directions: Heat butter in a large skillet over medium heat; cook and stir kale and shallot until kale is tender, about 5 minutes. Stir mushrooms, cream, Asiago cheese, garlic, salt, and black pepper into kale mixture. Reduce heat to low and simmer until cream has thickened and mushrooms are tender, about 10 minutes.
ingredients: 1 bunch kale, stems removed and leaves chopped
4 cloves garlic, crushed to a paste
1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Delicious Creamed Kale With Mushrooms
